name: Crazy Stunt Bike Racing - Extreme Awesome Trail Biker Sunts
name_original: Crazy Stunt Bike Racing - Extreme Awesome Trail Biker Sunts
description:
Unique Bike stunt game, you can only score if you twist, loop in the air. challenge is great, or are you?

Game gives you destructible bike with speed, jumps, twists, loops, Play and get unlimited Bike craze and fun with this agile and fast paced bike game.
Test your biker driving, bike racing and stunt skills! Use accelerator to control, Use accelerate and brake buttons to race and stop.
Enjoy this addictive bike racing game in beautiful city environment in background and have Fun Motorbike racing and stunts

Features:
• difficult well designed tracks
• realistic bike physics to give you an actual adrenaline rush
• Fun ragdoll physics
• Destructible motor bike
• Realistic bike shocks
• Fast paced , reacting bike using accelerator technology
• A fantastically responsive, intuitive bike experience
